question: For each of the 5 largest part sizes, find the part of that size with the largest retail price
sql: WITH top_sizes AS (SELECT DISTINCT p_size FROM part ORDER BY p_size DESC LIMIT 5), ranked_parts AS (SELECT p.p_partkey, p.p_name, p.p_size, p.p_retailprice, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY p.p_size ORDER BY p.p_retailprice DESC) AS price_rank FROM part p WHERE p.p_size IN (SELECT p_size FROM top_sizes)) SELECT p_partkey, p_name, p_size, p_retailprice FROM ranked_parts WHERE price_rank = 1 ORDER BY p_size DESC, p_retailprice DESC;
